title: RandomQuestion
explain: The idea of this site is to allow the user to upload a JSON file containing a list of questions (with their answers), set a timer and then run an exam simulation. Here is an example JSON.
error.wrong.format.title: Problems with attachment
error.wrong.format.desciption: Incorrect file type, to use the simulator attach a JSON that respects this structure.
error.wrong.syntax.json: You've attached a JSON containing syntax errors, to check and fix these errors you can use codebeautify.org.
error.json.is.not.array: The JSON you attached doesn't contain a list of question; attach a JSON that respects this structure.
error.syntax.of.json.question: There is a syntax problem in the element with index {{i}}; the JSON must respect this structure.
navigator.title: Questions list
